title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 103.8 - Special events
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 103.8 - Special events

State Regulations
A permit must be obtained from the appropriate governmental
authority having jurisdiction for any organized rally, race, exhibition or
demonstration of limited duration, which is conducted according to a
prearranged schedule and in which general public interest is manifested, except
that no such permit shall be required for an event which is held entirely on
private property within a designated area. The local governmental authority
having jurisdiction may establish safety requirements with respect to
protection of the participants and observers for any event for which a permit
is required. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
103.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
